catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 554
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: warrior deity standing in a forward-facing position; PR arm extended with hand in loose fist, apparently once holding an object; PL arm is held out with palm up in divine pose; armor with lion head on armor plate over stomach; standing on demons (base)
title: Bishamonten, the Guardian of the North
